授業目的: This course introduces students to the complex and dynamic relations between Japan and China in modern times. It will mainly concern itself with social and  cultural relations, although politics and economics will also be referenced.
到達目標: By taking this course students will gain a general understanding of the key issues in modern Japan-China relations in the global context.
